name: Timeseries of spherical harmonic expansion coefficients of the large-scale magnetospheric field
description: Electromagnetic transfer functions (C-responses) related to the model of electrical conductivity of the mantle for its 1-D structure, meaning that the conductivity is assumed to only vary with depth
